alert.note: Alert for Benton; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 16 at 5:51AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Benton, northern Washington, southern Delaware, northern Adair and northeastern Cherokee Counties through 630 AM CDT... At 551 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Twin Oaks to 2 miles west of Watts. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Fayetteville... Springdale... Siloam Springs... Farmington... Prairie Grove... Elkins... Tontitown... Bethel Heights... West Fork... Lincoln... Westville... Greenland... West Siloam Springs... Kansas... Watts... Oaks... Christie... Cincinnati... Leach... Scraper... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 55 and 75. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 AM CDT for northwestern Arkansas...and northeastern and east central Oklahoma.
